section.title: Installing A Messaging Server
section.para: Install the messaging queue server. Typically this is either Qpid or RabbitMQ but ZeroMQ (0MQ) is also available.
If Qpid is to be installed, refer to the Compute Administration Manual for configuration instructions, including adding rpc_backend=nova.rpc.impl_qpid to your nova.conf.
section.screen: sudo yum install openstack-utils memcached qpid-cpp-server
